types.html:
obus-flèche m (plural obus-flèches)

  1. (armament) kinetic energy penetrator, a non-explosive high-velocity projectile whose destruction power comes from its speed, its density and its hardness
trans: kinetic energy penetrator, a non-explosive high-velocity projectile whose destruction power comes from its speed, its density and its hardness
kinetic energy penetrator, a non-explosive high-velocity projectile whose destruction power comes from its speed, its density and its hardness
